frontmatter.title: Spreading the JAMstack
frontmatter.presenter_bio: Scott is Web Developer at [Karmarama](https://karmarama.com/) and is a huge advocate for JAMstack. He is also frequently involved in contributing to OSS, speaking at meetups and doing podcasts.
